unnormalised: Payment gateways, the real MVPs of e-commerce! Seriously, imagine selling sarees online during Diwali without them. Chaos! My auntie, Shanti aunty in Bangalore, would throw her hands up and declare the entire system "nonsense!" Finding a reliable one is harder than getting authentic Hyderabadi biryani outside Hyderabad. May god help you if your gateway glitches on 15th August! It's worse than convincing Sharmaji that online shopping is safe.
